text: The Mexican () is a 1955 Soviet drama movie directed by Vladimir Kaplunovsky.Татьяна Самойлова отмечает 80-летиеМЕКСИКАНЕЦ It stars Oleg Strizhenov, Boris Andreyev, and Daniil Sagal. ==Actors== *Oleg Strizhenov as Fernández / Felipe Rivera *Boris Andreyev as Felipe Vera *Daniil Sagal as Arellano *Mark Petrovsky as Ramos *Nadezhda Rumyantseva as May *Vladimir Dorofeyev as Diego == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:1955 drama movies Category:1950s historical movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Movies set in Mexico Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Soviet drama movies
title: The Mexican (1955 movie)
